title: Is Vel'Koz even good anymore?
body: My most recent games I've played as {{champion:161}} I ended up losing.  I need to know a good, updated build for {{champion:161}} and if he is even worth playing as anymore.

replies.body: I play him as support and usually do really well, but I am also a PhD in mathematics so...

solid 8/10, not the best, but he doesn't have too many terrible matchups. great in nearly all team comps. tons of build diversity. and comes with true damage.

what really separates the good vels from the bad ones is their capacity to land skill shots, you either do or you dont.
{{item:3802}} {{item:3285}} {{item:3020}} {{item:3135}} {{item:3151}} {{item:3089}}  Then sell {{item:3802}}  and get a new AP item or finish it into a {{item:3165}}
this is almost the build i use, but instead of {{item:3135}} i go {{item:3116}}

I picked up Vel'Koz a couple of months ago if I'm not mistaken and since then until now I've felt that he was in a good position.

Since I go support, here's what I usually get (in order.)
First, you start of with {{item:3303}}.
Then on you try to get {{item:3165}} ASAP, or at least get {{item:3802}} .
Then you get {{item:2301}} and if you haven't finished {{item:3165}} yet then finish it after.
Next get boots of your choice and get {{item:3285}} . If you need it for earlier some reason you can also get {{item:3157}} next instead of {{item:3285}} (don't forget to build it later though.)
Then you can build in any order you want for the last for items, which are {{item:3089}} and {{item:3135}}, I usually build {{item:3089}} then {{item:3135}} but if they have a lot of MR you can get {{item:3135}} .

As you can see, it's the staple Vel'Koz build but unlike mid it uses {{item:2301}} instead of {{item:3151}} . Late game though, should you desire it, you can sell the {{item:2301}} to buy {{item:3151}} .

The full build would look like this: {{item:2301}} {{item:3285}} {{item:3157}} {{item:3020}} {{item:3089}} {{item:3135}} and obviouslly once you finish all your items you want a {{item:2139}} up at all times (if you have the money for it.)

You can also use {{item:3116}} which I sometimes replace {{item:3157}}  with.

Also, don't forget to buy and use control wards!
He has crazy support carry potential.

He is still good, and he will probably get a bit more play once the mid-season hits and tanks start to be more common since he has true damage. Right now though he is still good but some match ups are a bit to rough for him. I'm not really a Vel'koz main but he is my 2nd best Mid laner which I have him at Rank 6 with almost 60k Mastery points I think.

As for the build, I'd do something like {{item:3165}} {{item:3285}} {{item:3089}} {{item:3135}} {{item:3157}} {{item:3020}} That is my general build but if the enemy team has to many tanks then I'll some times swap out {{item:3285}}  for {{item:3151}}
